com.yahoo.labs.samoa.topology

Interface ProcessingItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IProcessingItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProcessingItem, S4ProcessingItem, SamzaProcessingItem, ThreadsProcessingItem

    public interface ProcessingItem
extends IProcessingItem
    Processing item interface.
    Author:
    severien

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProcessingItem connectInputAllStream(Stream inputStream)
      Connects this processing item to the stream in a broadcast fashion.
      ProcessingItem connectInputKeyStream(Stream inputStream)
      Connects this processing item taking the event key into account.

      Connects this processing item in a round robin fashion.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.yahoo.labs.samoa.topology.IProcessingItem

        getProcessor

    • Method Detail

      • connectInputShuffleStream

        ProcessingItem connectInputShuffleStream(Stream inputStream)
        Connects this processing item in a round robin fashion. The events will be distributed evenly between the instantiated processing items.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to connect this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • connectInputKeyStream

        ProcessingItem connectInputKeyStream(Stream inputStream)
        Connects this processing item taking the event key into account. Events will be routed to the processing item according to the modulus of its key and the paralellism level. Ex.: key = 5 and paralellism = 2, 5 mod 2 = 1. Processing item responsible for 1 will receive this event.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to connect this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • connectInputAllStream

        ProcessingItem connectInputAllStream(Stream inputStream)
        Connects this processing item to the stream in a broadcast fashion. All processing items of this type will receive copy of the original event.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to connect this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • getParallelism

        int getParallelism()
        Gets processing item parallelism level.
        Returns:
        int
